# Introducion

Our goal is to predict the popularity of an online news articles. The level of popularity is (from 1 to 5, where 1 is the least popular and 5 the most) is based on number times the particular article has beenn shared. The whole data set is divided into two - training and testing. From now on we will refer to them as the training and the test. In order to predict popularity classes we utilize different algorithms.
